Federal_Fiscal_Stance.description: A strategic stance to resist the Central Government's reduction of the State's borrowing limits and tax devolution.
Federal_Fiscal_Stance.objective: To protect the 'Kerala Model of Development' and ensure alternative funding mechanisms despite central squeezes.

Knowledge_Economy_Transition.description: A comprehensive policy to transition Kerala from a consumer state to a knowledge-production hub.
Knowledge_Economy_Transition.objective: To create high-quality employment by linking higher education with modern industrial needs and skill development.

Investment_Promotion_Policy.description: Shift towards aggressively courting global private investment, highlighted by the delegation to the World Economic Forum (Davos).
Investment_Promotion_Policy.objective: To attract investments in ESG (Environmental, Social, and Governance), Green Hydrogen, and IT sectors, moving beyond traditional dependency on remittances.

Care_Economy_Framework.description: A policy framework addressing the demographic shift towards an aging population.
Care_Economy_Framework.objective: To professionalize care-giving and expand geriatric care facilities, turning the 'burden' of an aging population into an economic opportunity.

Resource_Mobilization_Strategy.description: Policy to maximize revenue from non-tax sources such as revising lease rents on government lands and user fees.
Resource_Mobilization_Strategy.objective: To reduce the fiscal deficit by augmenting state's own revenue sources.

Tax_Amnesty_Policy.description: A new amnesty scheme for traders to settle past tax arrears with waived penalties.
Tax_Amnesty_Policy.objective: To clear the backlog of tax litigations and improve immediate cash flow for the exchequer.

Green_Taxation.description: Policy to impose higher taxes on older, polluting vehicles.
Green_Taxation.objective: To discourage the use of high-emission vehicles and promote EV adoption.

Land_Tax_Reform.description: Policy to revise the slab rates for land tax based on the usage and location (Panchayat/Municipality/Corporation).
Land_Tax_Reform.objective: To make land tax progressive and increase local body revenues.

Agriculture_Policy.description: A shift from traditional farming to 'Smart Agriculture' using precision farming and value addition.
Agriculture_Policy.objective: To modernize the agricultural chain to withstand climate change and increase farmer income through the KERA project.

Higher_Education_Reform.description: Implementation of the Four Year Undergraduate Programme (FYUGP) and allowing foreign university collaborations.
Higher_Education_Reform.objective: To stem the outflow of students to foreign countries and raise academic standards to global levels.

Energy_Policy.description: Policy to establish Kerala as a Green Hydrogen Hub (Kochi and Vizhinjam).
Energy_Policy.objective: To achieve Net Zero carbon emissions and attract green energy investments.

Industrial_Policy.description: Liberalizing rules to allow private entities to set up industrial parks with government status.
Industrial_Policy.objective: To overcome land scarcity and accelerate industrial infrastructure development.

Transport_Policy.description: Integration of Water Metro, Kochi Metro, and KSRTC into a single seamless network.
Transport_Policy.objective: To reduce traffic congestion and promote public transport usage.

Extreme_Poverty_Eradication.description: A policy to identify and uplift the 'extremely poor' families (approx 64,006 identified) through specific micro-plans.
Extreme_Poverty_Eradication.objective: To make Kerala the first state in India to completely eradicate extreme poverty.

Gender_Policy.description: Mandatory allocation of a specific percentage of plan funds for women-centric schemes.
Gender_Policy.objective: To ensure financial empowerment of women and transgender communities (Mazhavillu scheme).

Digital_Governance.description: Completing the digital re-survey of land and moving all government services to digital platforms (e-Sevanam).
Digital_Governance.objective: To ensure transparency in land records and ease of doing business.

Urban_Policy.description: Moving from decentralized waste dumping to scientific processing via KSWMP (Kerala Solid Waste Management Project).
Urban_Policy.objective: To solve the waste crisis in urban local bodies and prevent environmental degradation.
